title: Login success with valid credentials
description: Verify that user can log in successfully with valid NextAuth credentials.

steps.description: Navigate to login page.
Enter valid username and password.
Submit the login form.
User is authenticated and redirected to LIMS dashboard.

title: Login failure with invalid credentials
description: Verify that login fails and user receives appropriate error message when invalid credentials are used.

steps.description: Navigate to login page.
Enter invalid username and/or password.
Submit the login form.
User is not authenticated and an error message is displayed.

title: Create new DNA extraction worklist with valid data
description: Verify that user can create a new DNA extraction worklist by filling all mandatory metadata and kit configuration fields and submitting the creation form.

steps.description: Log in and navigate to DNA Extraction section.
Click the 'New Worklist' button.
Fill all required metadata and kit/reagent configuration fields with valid data.
Submit the creation form.
New worklist is created with exactly 32 blank sample rows automatically generated.
User is redirected to the detail page of the newly created worklist.

title: Create worklist form validation
description: Verify the creation form prevents submission when required fields are missing or invalid data is entered.

steps.description: Navigate to 'New Worklist' form.
Attempt to submit the form with missing required fields.
Form validation errors are displayed and form submission is blocked.
Enter invalid data types or formats for inputs (e.g. invalid dates or text in numeric fields).
Validation errors are shown for invalid inputs.

title: Worklist list pagination and search
description: Verify that the worklist listing page supports pagination with page size of 10 and real-time search filtering by name, kit lot, and technician.

steps.description: Navigate to DNA Extraction worklist list page.
Initially displays up to 10 worklists per page.
Use pagination controls to navigate between pages.
Correct worklists load on each page.
Enter search terms for name filter and observe filtered results.
Repeat search with kit lot and technician filters separately and combined.
Worklists are filtered accurately in real-time according to search criteria.

title: Worklist detail page data rendering
description: Verify that the detail page correctly displays all metadata, 32 sample rows, and QC results with a tabbed interface.

steps.description: Open an existing DNA extraction worklist detail page.
Metadata tab displays the worklist header information and kit/reagent configuration.
Switch to 32-Sample Grid tab.
All 32 sample rows are displayed in a scrollable, editable grid with correct data fields.
QC result fields are visible and correctly associated with sample rows.

title: Inline editing and batch save of sample data
description: Verify user can edit sample data inline in the 32-sample grid and save all changes in batch atomically.

steps.description: Navigate to a worklist 32-Sample Grid tab.
Edit multiple fields across several sample rows inline.
UI tracks that unsaved changes exist and enables the 'Save' button.
Click the 'Save' button to update all modified rows.
Batch update API request succeeds and changes are persisted in the database.
Audit fields for updated rows are modified to reflect update timestamps and user info.
User is shown confirmation message upon successful save.

title: Prevent save button when no edits in sample grid
description: Verify that the 'Save' button is disabled or hidden when no sample data edits have been made.

steps.description: Open a worklist 32-Sample Grid tab with no edits.
'Save' button is disabled or not clickable.
Make an inline edit in any sample row.
'Save' button becomes enabled or visible.

title: Worklist status tracking and badge display
description: Verify that worklist status (DRAFT, IN_PROGRESS, COMPLETED) updates correctly and is displayed as color-coded badges in list and detail views.

steps.description: Create a new worklist showing status as DRAFT.
Update worklist progress to IN_PROGRESS and refresh views.
Status badge updates to IN_PROGRESS with correct color.
Mark worklist as COMPLETED and refresh views.
Status badge updates to COMPLETED with correct color.

title: Delete a worklist and cascading delete verification
description: Verify that deleting a worklist removes all associated sample rows and QC results from the database.

steps.description: Navigate to the DNA extraction worklist list page.
Select an existing worklist and initiate delete action.
Confirm the deletion.
Worklist is removed from the list.
Associated ExtractionWorklistRows and ExtractionQCResults are removed from database (verified via API or DB query).
User receives confirmation notification about deletion success.

title: API authentication enforcement
description: Verify that all RESTful API endpoints reject requests without valid authenticated sessions.

steps.description: Make API requests (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE) to worklist endpoints without authentication token.
API responds with authentication error (e.g., 401 Unauthorized).
Make same API requests with valid authentication token.
API responds with expected successful status.

title: Audit trail fields update on data mutations
description: Verify that audit fields CreatedAt, UpdatedAt, and CreatedBy are correctly set/updated on creation and update of worklists and sample rows.

steps.description: Create a new worklist via API or UI.
CreatedAt, UpdatedAt timestamps are set and CreatedBy is set to the logged-in user's ID.
Update the worklist metadata or sample rows.
UpdatedAt is updated to the latest timestamp while CreatedAt remains unchanged.
CreatedBy remains as original creator's user ID.

title: API payload validation and error handling
description: Verify that all API endpoints validate incoming query parameters and request payloads, and reject invalid data with appropriate error responses.

steps.description: Submit API requests with missing required fields in JSON payload.
API responds with 400 Bad Request and validation error messages.
Submit API requests with invalid types or formats for fields.
API responds with clear error messages describing validation failures.

title: UI responsiveness on desktop and tablet devices
description: Verify the UI layouts adapt correctly to desktop and tablet screen sizes, ensuring the wide 32-sample grid and form elements remain usable and scrollable as designed.

steps.description: Access the application on a desktop resolution screen.
32-sample grid is fully visible with horizontal scrolling as needed.
Access the application on a tablet resolution screen.
UI components adapt with vertical scrolling; data grids remain functional and easy to navigate.

title: Performance of list and detail API endpoints
description: Verify that typical usage queries for listing and retrieving extraction worklists complete in under 100ms.

steps.description: Send list API requests for extraction worklists under normal load.
API responses are returned within 100 milliseconds.
Send detail API requests for a single extraction worklist including all 32 sample rows and QC results.
API responses are returned within 100 milliseconds.

title: Navigation menu integration with DNA Extraction icon
description: Verify the DNA Extraction navigation item is present between Worklists and Instruments sections with the correct molecule icon and navigates to the correct section.

steps.description: Log in and observe the sidebar navigation menu.
DNA Extraction menu item is present between Worklists and Instruments.
DNA molecule icon is displayed properly next to the item label.
Click the DNA Extraction navigation item.
User is navigated to the DNA Extraction worklist listing page.

title: Robust error handling and user notifications
description: Verify the system displays user-friendly error messages and loading indicators throughout workflows, including API failures and validation errors.

steps.description: Simulate API failure during worklist creation or update.
User sees a clear error message describing the failure.
Trigger validation errors on forms.
Validation error messages appear inline with input fields.
Observe loading spinners or progress indicators while data is being fetched or saved.
Loading indicators are visible and disappear once operation completes.
